pages.text: Va misli kasone ki moli xudro ʙaroi talaʙi rizoi Alloh, ʙinoʙar ustuvorii e'tiqodi xud nafaqa mekunand, monandi ʙoƣe ast, ki dar teppae qaror dorad va ʙar on ʙoroni saxte ʙiʙorad va du ʙaroʙar meva dihad va agar ʙoroni saxt ʙar on naʙorad, ʙoroni saʙuke (saʙnam) kifojat kunad. Va Alloh ʙar on ci mekuned ʙa zohir va ʙotini sumo ʙinost. Va har jakro ʙa daracai ixlosas podos medihad

Ojo kase az sumo dust dorad, ki ʙoƣe az daraxtoni xurmo va angur dosta ʙosad va zeri on cujʙorho oʙi sirin ravon ʙosad va uro dar on ʙoƣ az har guna mevaho ʙosad va dar hole, ki piri uro faro girad va nametavonad in guna ʙoƣdori kunad va farzandoni za'if va notavon dorad, nametavonand uro jori kunand. Nogahon girdʙode, ki otase dar on ast, ʙar on ʙivazad va ʙoƣ ʙisuzad? Incunin Alloh ojotro ʙaroi sumo ʙajon mekunad, to ʙiandesed

Ej kasone, ki imon ʙa Man ovarded va pajravi rasuloni Man hasted! Az pokizahoi on ci sumo ʙa dast ovardaed az on ci Mo az zamin ʙarojaton rujondem, nafaqa kuned va qasd makuned, ki sifati pasti onro, ʙa kamʙaƣalon ʙidihed va hol on ki agar in guna ciz (nafaqa) ʙa sumo doda savad, xudaton girandai on nested, magar on ki az ʙadii on casm ʙipused. Pas ci guna rozi mesaved ʙaroi Alloh onro, ki xud namepisanded? Va ʙidoned, ki Alloh az sadaqahoi sumo ʙenijoz va dar hama hol sazovori sitois ast

In ʙaxili va ixtijor kardani sadaqai pastsifat az sajton ast, ki sumoro ʙo tangdasti metarsonad va ʙa ʙaxili tasviq menamojad va ʙa gunoh amr mekunad. Alloh sumoro ʙa omurzisi gunohojaton va afzuni dar ne'mat, va'da medihad. Va Alloh faroxne'mat ast va ʙa a'mol va nijathojaton donost

Hikmatro ʙa kase, ki xohad, meʙaxsad va har kas, ki hikmat ʙa u doda savad, ʙa rosti, ki xajri ʙisjore ʙa u doda sudaast. Va hec kore cuz ʙo hikmat ancom namejoʙad. Va cuz xiradmandon kase pand namegirand
